snippet: Mayor Eduardo Paes of Rio de Janeiro said the city would fail to keep the promise of cleaning the polluted Guanabara Bay for the 2016 Olympics.
abstract: Mayor Eduardo Paes of Rio de Janeiro says the city will fail to keep the promise of cleaning the polluted Guanabara Bay for the 2016 Olympics, where sailing events are to be held; Olympic sailors have described venue as a 'sewer.'
lead_paragraph: Mayor Eduardo Paes of Rio de Janeiro said the city would fail to keep the promise of cleaning the polluted Guanabara Bay for the 2016 Olympics.

headline.main: Rio de Janeiro Mayor Says Polluted Bay Won’t Be Clean
headline.print_headline: Rio Mayor Says Polluted Bay Won’t Be Clean
